greetings.welcome: I’m happy to welcome you on my official website and connect with your beautiful energy

aboutMe.name: My name is Kate
aboutMe.profession: I am a practicing tarot reader with a background   in psychology. I started my pathway in Tarot cards 11 years ago. Back then, it was not so easy to find good specialists or education in this field.

AboutIndigoFlow.changes: This area has gone through significant changes in recent years. An increasing number of people are engaged in self-development. Psychology and spirituality help us find answers to our questions, thereby healing the soul from old wounds and accumulated negativity. They allow us to discover the core of the problem, unwind the tangle of external and internal circumstances and find an adequate solution, paving the way for a prosperous future. A conscious path is exactly what we all aspire to. Tarot cards are one of the most effective instruments for psychological work on yourself and spiritual growth.
AboutIndigoFlow.MyProfessionalExperience: My professional experience and personal life have also overcome through many changes in the last 10 years. In addition to my basic Tarot knowledge, I’ve got a degree in psychology in Europe, studied the power of meditation, and I am a certified Mindfulness Coach; dived into work with Tarot cards, developing my knowledge with a variety of books, courses and, of course, practice.
AboutIndigoFlow.MyProfessionalExperienceContinuation: Many people know that the best psychologists and spiritual guides are those who have undergone many difficulties in their lives and were able to help themselves, looking for keys and engaging in endless psychological self-development. I can easily say it about myself. Without diving into unnecessary details, I can tell that I have personally experienced many situations such as studies abroad, numerous trips and long-term residence in Europe and Asia, working with people of different nationalities in companies of various directions, scales and financial opportunities and, of course, building love relationships and friendship. I know firsthand what it is like to overcome serious illnesses (from the experience of my relatives), participation in magical wars (when you have to cleanse yourself and defend yourself from magical influences), building your life from 0, periods of different income and lifestyle. I will be glad to help you review and improve your life with the help of Tarot cards, and, if necessary, share my personal experience.

cardService.activities: At the moment, my activities include:

myServices.tarotReading: Personal Tarot readings online and spiritual guidance
myServices.content: Entertaining and educational Tarot content on YouTube, TikTok, Instagram
myServices.creativeProjects: Art direction & advising of creative projects involving psychology and spirituality

ConsultingTopics.title: Consultation Topics
ConsultingTopics.title2: During your personal consultations, we will consider all your questions. Such questions may be:

Studies&Work.title: Studies & Work
Studies&Work.text_1: choice of direction in study and / or educational institution

loveRelationships.title: Love relationships
loveRelationships.text_1: feelings, thoughts, plans, actions of a partner
loveRelationships.text_2: how does your partner see you

PersonalDevelopment.title: Personal development
PersonalDevelopment.text_3: the lessons you are currently going through

Relocation.title: Relocation / Tourist trips
Relocation.text_1: questions of choice: to go or not to go, where to go
Relocation.text_2: how to settle in a new place

OtherTopics.title: Other topics
OtherTopics.text_1: I am open to a variety of topics that interest you
OtherTopics.text_2: I am open to a variety of topics that interest you
OtherTopics.text_3: honesty with yourself and the tarot reader in my face will allow you to find the most effective solution to any situation.

card_1.title: Classic
card_1.aboutThePackage: A full consultation, including the whole range of topics and questions that interest you
card_1.service: The service is provided on the day and time you choose, reserved in advance in direct  (Telegram, Whatsapp)

card_2.title: Thematic
card_2.aboutThePackage: Consultation on one specific topic, e.g. relationship with a person; the situation in the workplace; opening a business; moving to another country
card_2.service: The service is provided on the day and time you choose, reserved in advance in direct  (Telegram, Whatsapp)

card_3.title: Express
card_3.aboutThePackage: 10-minute answer to 1 question in the format of a video recording or voice message
card_3.service: The service is reserved in direct (Telegram, Whatsapp)
card_3.cost: Cost: $25 per response, is delivered within 1–3 days
card_3.urgentResponse: Urgent response: $50 per response is delivered within 1–3 hours

card_4.title: Golden Card
card_4.aboutThePackage: The card includes 4 hours of consultations per month. 1 hour per week.
card_4.service: The service is reserved in advance in direct (Telegram, Whatsapp)
card_4.cost: Cost: $540 per card ($135 per hour, 10% discount)

addition.title: You can spend this time on:
addition.text_3: Ask 6 questions for 10 minutes each (6 express tarot readings).
